item.title: Python 3, threading and references
item.description: Creating a thread I used threading to enable real-time graphing of data from sensors. One thread collected data from the sensors. The main thread ran the real time graph. I had a few problems getting started. It came down to my incorrect use of brackets when creating the thread. When we create a thread using the threading library, we need to pass the target to the thread without using brackets. e.
